item.title: Need help with ::pickup/::item commands
item.dc:creator: @jordan7 Jordan7
item.description:
@jordan7 wrote:

This is what I have with no errors

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME HERE") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

Try thatâ€¦

EDIT: Also, you need help with ::item?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ::pickup/::item commands
item.dc:creator: @jtsou jtsou
item.description:
@jtsou wrote:

heres the pickup command please fix and post back

} else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("x91")) {
				try {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
					if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
						addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("No such item.");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10");
				}

Read full topic
